bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Created attachment 1204452 Restores original 10-amdgpu.conf
Restores original 10-amdgpu.conf, deletes Fedora's "in-house" 10-amdgpu.conf
10-amdgpu.conf generated here, in xorg-x11-drv-amdgpu.spec: https://pkgs.fedoraproject.org/cgit/rpms/xorg-x11-drv-amdgpu.git/tree/xorg-x11-drv-amdgpu.spec#n50 which overwrites the original 10-amdgpu.conf: https://cgit.freedesktop.org/xorg/driver/xf86-video-amdgpu/tree/conf/10-amdgpu.conf#n1 when installed, along with the package, breaks the Xorg init on a machine with non-compatible GPU: ... X.Org X Server 1.18.4 ... (==) Using system config directory "/usr/share/X11/xorg.conf.d" (==) No Layout section. Using the first Screen section. (==) No screen section available. Using defaults. (**) |-->Screen "Default Screen Section" (0) (**) | |-->Monitor "<default monitor>" (==) No device specified for screen "Default Screen Section". Using the first device section listed. (**) | |-->Device "AMDgpu" (**) | |-->GPUDevice "nvidia0" ... (II) LoadModule: "amdgpu" (II) Loading /usr/lib64/xorg/modules/drivers/amdgpu_drv.so (II) Module amdgpu: vendor="X.Org Foundation" ... (II) LoadModule: "nouveau" (II) Loading /usr/lib64/xorg/modules/drivers/nouveau_drv.so ... (II) AMDGPU: Driver for AMD Radeon chipsets: ..., .. (II) NOUVEAU driver (II) NOUVEAU driver for NVIDIA chipset families : ... (II) [drm] nouveau interface version: 1.3.1 (EE) Screen 0 deleted because of no matching config section. (II) UnloadModule: "nouveau" (EE) Device(s) detected, but none match those in the config file. (EE) Fatal server error: (EE) no screens found(EE) (EE) Please consult the Fedora Project support at http://wiki.x.org for help. (EE) Please also check the log file at "/var/log/Xorg.0.log" for additional information. (EE) (EE) Server terminated with error (1). Closing log file.
See the original commit for explanation why is the original 10-amdgpu.conf as it is: xfree86: Introduce OutputClass configuration https://cgit.freedesktop.org/xorg/xserver/commit/hw/xfree86/man/xorg.conf.man?id=a270bb1

xorg-x11-drv-amdgpu-1.1.2-2.fc24 has been pushed to the Fedora 24 testing repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report. See https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/QA:Updates_Testing for instructions on how to install test updates. You can provide feedback for this update here: https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2016-50d98b2466

xorg-x11-drv-amdgpu-1.1.2-2.fc25 has been pushed to the Fedora 25 testing repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report. See https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/QA:Updates_Testing for instructions on how to install test updates. You can provide feedback for this update here: https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2016-0a2f55e8e2
